about_the_game: Become an avatar of immolation with the animated fire character skin. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
detailed_description: Become an avatar of immolation with the animated fire character skin. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
legal_notice: Outbreak © 2016-2018 Dead Drop Studios LLC. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended

name: Outbreak - Fire Player Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated.
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware sound card.
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.

short_description: Become an avatar of immolation with the animated fire character skin.
